pullrequest.title: Add msgs::ModelToSDF, and simple shape helper functions

content.raw:
the other use case is something like [this line](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/fc8b91812634331194e9ec9dad5d9221cfc72306/gazebo/physics/World.cc#cl-2111) that updates an existing light sdf element with fields from a message. It's more for convenience. 

I think the most simple approach now is to check `_msg.joint_size() != 0` as suggested by @chapulina. We then document the conversion function better to let users know the effect of converting a repeated field. How does that sound?
